title: Childcare provider verification (nanny/babysitter)
dataVerified: Provider name, photo, qualifications, DBS check, references, first aid cert
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Credential status (active/verified). Real-time verification shows provider photo, DBS/background check date, qualifications (early childhood education), first aid certification, references. Link to government childcare regulator or established childcare platform system. Verifier can display 'Register this childcare session' prompt
rationale: Parent verifies nanny/babysitter credentials, background check, first aid certification before leaving child in their care. Domain binding verifies government childcare regulator (e.g., ofsted.gov.uk) or established childcare platform (care.com, sittercity.com). Prevents unlicensed childcare provider fraud. Critical child safety.
